title: Physics and chemistry of water
creator_credit: Unilever Films, World Wide Pictures, Peter Bradford and Sarah Erulkar
brief_description: Explains how the molecular structure of water determines its unique properties, discussing the solid, liquid and gaseous phases, surface tension, solvent action and the thermal properties which provide a stable environment for life.
creator_credit_for_label: Unilever Films, World Wide Pictures, Peter Bradford and Sarah Erulkar
